original_text: If we do things like that, we will cause the Lord to be angry. We should worship only him. You know that we are not stronger than he is!
korean_text: 그러면 우리가 주를 노여워하시게 하겠느냐 우리가 주보다 강한 자냐

sentences.original_text: If we do things like that,
we will cause the Lord to be angry.
we are not stronger than he is!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그분보다 더 강하지 않다는 것을!
